features: FORMULATED FOR SENSITIVE SKIN - This mens shave gel is specially designed for sensitive skin. Formulated with aloe vera, vitamin E and glycerin which helps moisturize, repair damage layers and lubricate your skin after shaving. Our clear shave gel minimizes the risk of skin irritation, leaving your skin feeling soft and satiny smooth after every shave.

HYDRATES, PROTECTS AND SOOTHES - Tomb 45 shave gel lather softening the stubble of beards that helps your razor glide effortlessly over your skin, ensuring a close and comfortable shave. This beard gel provides a close and smooth shave to help prevent razor bumps, nicks and micro nuts.

PROTECTS SKIN WHEN SHAVING - Our mens shaving gel improves razor performance and glide giving you an extra protection from shaving irritation and leaving you an ultra-clean smooth beard edging and shaving experience. A great shaving accessories for men.

SAFE AND CONVENIENT TO USE - This clear shaving gel comes in an easy squeeze bottle for comfortable gel dispensing - no clog, no mess, no waste, ideal barber supplies for barber stations. Unlike shaving foam, clear gel has maximum visibility for a precise smooth crisp shave.

CUSTOMER FIRST - Your satisfaction is our priority! Our Tomb 45 Shave Gel has obtained the necessary product certifiction to ensure customer safety and protection. Along with this, we offer customer support. So, if you have any questions or concern, please feel free to reach out to us.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: THE STORY BEHIND THE BRAND In ancient Egypt, Where barbering started only royalty and high society were allowed to have proper burials. The tomb of Meryma’at, a famous barber during that period, can be found in the Lower Cemetery of Thebes. It was numbered 45 and the brand takes its name from the legendary Egyptian who carved his name in history. Tomb45 is A brand that represents where barbering started, the influence we had, the respect for the profession, and the rebirth of it all.

HOW TOMB45 SHAVE GEL BECAME A STAPLE IN EVERY BARBER SHOP Tomb45 Shave Gel has become a commonly used product across barber shops in the U.S. As with most word of mouth stories spread in these shops, the formula is like an intimate secret shared by barbers because it’s made by one of their own. Chris Bossio gained popularity by sharing his knowledge through intensive hands-on courses and "Look & Learn" classes that have helped countless barbers across the United States and around the world. His passion for barber education and the demand of his students to develop a line of products gave birth to Tomb45, a brand that knows what the customer wants simply through years of experience in the field. He produced the Tomb45 collection which includes its shaving gel for men and women. Now you can get that look of a professional shave right in the comfort of your own home.

HEAD OVER HEELS FOR THAT CLEAN SHAVEN LOOK Grooming can present some challenges especially if you have thick and unruly hair that grows on various parts of your body. Tomb45 understands that when you prefer a clean shaven look wherever you need it, you’ll get it done with the help of its classic, easy-to-use Shave Gel. Packed with Antioxidants: When dry shaving causes redness and irritation on the skin, Tomb45 Shave Gel can help repair damaged layers because of its Vitamin E formula that penetrates deeply to spur the growth of new skin cells and fight free radicals.Aloe Vera Hydration: Aloe’s high water content hydrates your skin and prevents scaling and dryness. Its anti-inflammatory enzymes can treat small cuts, soothe tiny bumps, and reduce redness.Doubles as Moisturizer: Glycerin, another key ingredient, acts as an emollient that seals in moisture to prevent flaking or roughness. Its lubricating action leaves skin soft and supple as it slows down signs of aging.

CLEAR GEL, FRESH SCENT Our shaving gel sports the refreshing green color of rebirth with a clean, masculine scent that lingers but is not overpowering. Men and women love the clear gel which makes the hairline visible so you don’t have to guess where to shave next. EASY SQUEEZE BOTTLE Our 8 oz applicator bottle is an essential item in every bathroom and barber station. Pack it in your grooming kit or toiletry bag everytime you travel. The translucent bottle lets you see what's left of the contents so you’ll know when to buy a new one. Apply the gel directly without any mess, waste or spills. PERSONAL SHAVE, PROFESSIONAL LOOK Tired of having nicks, cuts or razor burn whenever you use your razor or trimmer? Make your daily shaving experience easier and more comfortable. Order a bottle of Tomb45 Shave Gel for yourself and a loved one today and have a clean, smooth, and refreshing shave every time!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great shaving gel.!
reviews.reviewText: What to thank amazon for delivering my package on time. Secondly, i read reviews about this shaving gel which i’m very familiar with and it’s a great product used this product in the past 2 1/2 years and it works great.! Also, my shaving gel was never damaged when i received this product. I have read and seen reviews on the amazon app and certain customers received this product and their packaging was damaged along with the shaving gel bottle as well. I just want to say my package 📦 was handled with care and i didn’t receive this product damaged. In short, this shaving gel is the bomb 💣 and it’s a must buy if you are a barber or not.! The price of this product is very convenient.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Much better than shave cream
reviews.reviewText: Made it much easier to line up my beard, and my skin feels significantly better moisturized.

reviews.reviewText: The smell is not strong at all like describe. It doesn’t lather up like cheaper & better shaving cream. Needs more chattering ingredients

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I am trying this as an alternative to Edge. I'll be going back to Edge because it is easier to use. This product has a narrow tip, and you have to squeeze like hell to get the product out. It is pretty viscous, and there is no way to set it upside down. It lubricates well and the scent is the usual barbershop scent.
